original_text: And he arose and went: and, behold, a man of Ethiopia, an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians, who had the charge of all her treasure, and had come to Jerusalem for to worship,
korean_text: 일어나 가서 보니 에디오피아 사람 곧 에디오피아 여왕 간다게의 모든 국고를 맡은 관리인 내시가 예배하러 예루살렘에 왔다가

sentences.original_text: and, behold, a man of Ethiopia,
under Candace queen of the Ethiopians,
sentences.korean_translation: 에티오피아 사람들의 여왕 칸다케 아래 있었고

sentences.original_text: who had the charge of all her treasure,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀의 모든 보물을 관리하는 자였으며

sentences.original_text: and had come to Jerusalem for to worship,
